Reviews.Title: Great deal..nice package
Reviews.Author: Stuart D. Knapp
Reviews.Content: Underwater is great once you figure out the white balance..other cameras do this easier..Nice camera for everyday use outside of case.Case is nice and solid and allows full functionality underwater.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Intova IC14 Sports Digital Camera with 180' Waterproof Housing (Black) + <2> Intova Tactical LED Torch + <3> Intova Torch Handstrap +
<4> Transcend 16GB Class10 SD Card + <5> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <6> Precision Design PD-SDC Case +
<7> Floating Foam Camera Strap + <8> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <9> LCD Screen Protectors +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Intova IC14 Sports Digital Camera with 180' Waterproof Housing (Black) with 16GB SD Card + Intova Compact Torch + Handstrap + (2) Cases + Accessory Kit
